alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Briscoe; Castro; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Parmer; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 11:53AM CST until January 16 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Bailey, Cochran, Hale, Hockley, Lamb, Briscoe, Castro, Parmer, and Swisher Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor activities if possible. Use caution while outside and wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Several layers of warm clothing will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat. Wrap pipes with insulation and seal windows to avoid loss of heat from your home. Keep a slow steady stream of water running from indoor faucets, and open cabinet doors to allow warm air to circulate around inside pipes. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Bailey; Briscoe; Castro; Cochran; Hale; Hockley; Lamb; Parmer; Swisher
